data.what_is:
Pyze Growth Intelligence addresses the increasingly critical business need to engage and retain users across disparate platforms.  Pyze develops holistic user profiles by aggregating user behavior across platforms and enables realtime, targeted engagement & personalization campaigns to ensure individualized experiences for all users:

- Gain competitive advantage by understanding user clusters, trends, patterns, and anomalies
- Provide personalized engagement, content and experience to users based on actions, behavior, and usage milestones
- Run automated campaigns to maximize brand loyalty, revenue, engagement or desired business objective

Pyze offers a marketing and intelligence platform designed to enable mobile and web app publishers maximize growth through automated analysis, engagement, and personalization. Pyze utilizes machine learning to automate segmentation for clustering users based on shared characteristics and enables automated engagement and personalization with each set of users to achieve desired business outcomes.

Pyze provides an end-to-end solution for automating data capture, analytics, segmentation, campaign execution & personalization across platforms.  Pyze offers a number of sophisticated marketing services to gain deep insights into user behavior across platforms to drive meaningful customer engagement.

Capabilities and Benefits:
The Pyze Growth Intelligence Platform features a number of core capabilities that tailor the solution for your organization's goals. We recognize that organizations have different business objectives and have developed a highly scalable platform that can address each specific objective.

- Usage and Behavioral Analytics enables visibility into trends, patterns, and behaviors across web and mobile app users to analyze, visualize, explore and act on insights.
- Automated Segmentation allows brands to precisely target specific user sets through automated segmentation and real-time explorations across the entire user base.
- Contextual Marketing determines the time and place each user will be most receptive to messages and utilizes usage patterns, context, and other factors to deliver the right message at the right time.
- Growth Automation enables work-flow and behavior driven automated engagement with each user to onboard, activate, engage and retain users throughout their lifetime.
- Personalization Intelligence enables brands to personalize every experience, including content feeds, user interfaces, communication messages, specific features, and products.
- App Groups provide aggregate user behavior data across mobile and web apps to enable omnichannel campaigns, cross-platform personalization and benchmarking.
data.product_description: Pyze Growth Intelligence is a software that provides behavior-based, real-time insights and automated touch points to build meaningful relationships with each user without the time, effort and cost required by data analytics solutions, it delivers intelligence-driven marketing via in-app and push messaging and recommendations to cultivate loyalty, increase engagement and grow monetization.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Warp speed growth with advanced intelligence features
plan_features: All the power of Growth plan plus:

pricing_plans.plan_description: Custom Pricing, Aggregation and Integration Features
plan_features: All the power of Warp Speed plan plus:

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
I use Pyze to understand our customers and engage with them. My favorite Pyze capability is the automated user segments across our Web and Mobile apps. We use these segments to drive automated campaigns through mobile touch points and emails. We've seen a significant increase in conversions and also increased engagement of our platform thanks to the targeted campaigns we're able to automate based on user behaviors and actions.

What do you dislike about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
The UI navigation takes a little getting used to.  They've done a good job of making the product very visual in terms of the types of charts but the usage flow can be streamlined.

Recommendations to others considering Pyze Growth Intelligence(r):
If you're looking for automation of analysis and campaigns, Pyze is a great option.  Pyze provides a good automated analytics, segmentation, and campaigns. They also have an in-app personalization capabilities but we haven't implemented those yet.

What problems is Pyze Growth Intelligence(r) solving and how is that benefiting you?
We selected Pyze because we had a project focused on increasing customer engagement and retention. We were able to increase our retention rates by about 300% using their Growth Automation drip campaigns and successfully improved overall user engagement by 150 - 200% using targeted campaigns based on user behavior.

We've seen a significant increase in conversions and also increased engagement of our platform thanks to the targeted campaigns we're able to automate based on user behaviors and actions.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
Pyze is in my opinion the best mobile growth solution on the market.  Not only does it allow you to auto segment your mobile base but also does it allow you to target any automatically defined segment.  This is quite amazing.  You can act nimbly on any lever of mobile growth: onboarding, activation, retention.  Push notifications and in-app messages are so easy to implement and offer a very high degree of customization.  I highly recommend Pyze over any other mobile engagement solutions on the market.

What do you dislike about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
Well, it's hard to find something I dislike about Pyze.  The team is extremely responsive and when a new feature is needed or when you share a recommendation, they are listening to your feedback and act on it very quickly.  As a result, it's hard to dislike anything from their solution.  The UX is very intuitive and colorful and at this point, I really like what they deliver to the market.

Recommendations to others considering Pyze Growth Intelligence(r):
Make sure other solutions you are considering integrate with mobile attribution leaders, too, as Pyze does.  This is very important...

What problems is Pyze Growth Intelligence(r) solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are many.  Starting with product-market fit definition for new mobile services.  As well as refining product-market fit on a continuous basis via in-app messages and push notifications with deep linking.  Everyday, I get the nimble product iteration benefits by targeting in-app behaviors in a fraction of the time that it would take me with other tools and collecting data to learn faster than my competitors.

I highly recommend Pyze over any other mobile engagement solutions on the market.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
What I love best about Pyze is their automated segmentation capability to group like users and running automated campaigns to target each user group.  They track the best time to send messages to each user so our open rates are pretty high and they also give us the ability to personalize app experience for each user.  Pyze is great at providing deep analytics with minimal effort - I think we got our first app up and running in about 10 minutes and their analytics are probably the easiest to use of any platform.

What do you dislike about Pyze Growth Intelligence(r)?
Some of the navigation menus were hard to follow.  I asked the Pyze team to improve them and they were pretty responsive in addressing the issues. Some of the more advanced screens could use a video tutorial to accompany the product documentation.

Recommendations to others considering Pyze Growth Intelligence(r):
I recommend checking out a free trial of their paid plan.  We really saw a lot of value in their Intelligence Explorer for Automated Segmentation and Growth Automation for automating campaigns.

What problems is Pyze Growth Intelligence(r) solving and how is that benefiting you?
The key business problem we wanted to solve was improving retention and engagement across the 14 mobile apps in our portfolio. With Pyze, we've been able to manage marketing and engagement campaigns across all our apps with the same time and effort it used to take to launch less effective campaigns for one app. We've see a significant uplift in retention and engagement without having to manually spend hours on setting us segmentation and manual funnels. For us, increased engagement directly correlates with increased revenue. The automated segmentation is a game changer in enabling us to target specific groups of users and personalizing experience for each user. .
